description: Priority override: 다국어(ko/en) + GA 로그 안정화 + 다크모드 지원 최우선 구현

userStories.title: 다국어(ko/en) 전면 적용 + GA 이벤트 로그 스키마/전송 안정화 + 다크모드 지원
userStories.description: Implement backlog ticket `i18n-ga-darkmode-priority` as top-priority agenda.
acceptanceCriteria: Core conversion funnel UI copy supports ko/en toggle or locale routing.
GA events for conversion funnel include stable schema (event name + required params) and are emitted on key states.
Dark mode is available in core conversion screens and key text/background contrast is accessible.
userStories.notes: seeded_from_backlog=false; priority_override=true; metric=non-ko conversion_completed rate; owner=ceo+growth+qa+analytics+designer
